I have a repeater group setup and I am trying to set it so I have two repeater fields per table row. Is there a way to make it so if the repeater field is above 2 is uses different code?
I am trying to achieve this layout.
Right now the top 2 blog posts are in a row so for the next 2 I need them to be in another tr row
